name: Andrey Luiz
title: Senior Software Engineer
summary: Senior Software Engineer with 12+ years of experience in web and mobile development, focused on React, TypeScript, and AI tools. Led the adoption of critical features for SonarCloud's CaYC team, streamlining workflow efficiency. Developed Web3 projects, including a Web3 powered game, and a React Native wallet. Earned AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner certification.

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
achievements: Developed Web3 projects using SvelteKit, integrating with many types of blockchains and smart contracts.
Implemented a React Native wallet application for a big client from India, integrating with a custom made blockchain and securing the first stakes.
Crafted a game using Phaser.js for a staking portal, getting positive feedback from the client and granting 600 players in the first month.

experience.title: Senior Front-end Developer
achievements: Delivered three key features for SonarCloud's project section in React, integrating with RESTful APIs to enhance data retrieval and improve Clean Code Taxonomy integration and user education on coding best practices.
Pioneered CaYC team's adoption of 8 critical features, using React and TypeScript, streamlining workflow efficiency and cross-team collaboration.
Migrated SonarCloud's issues screen to MIUI using React, receiving positive feedback from senior leadership for improving the daily workflow of developers.

experience.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
achievements: Enhanced Equip app's map search and rental processes, using Svelte and TypeScript, reducing prototype development time by 3 months.
Released the Equip app on Play Store and Apple Store, expanding the company's reach in three countries.
Refactored the Equip app's codebase using React Native and TypeScript, reducing the time to iterate on new features.

experience.title: Senior Front-end Developer
achievements: Enhanced and refactored Anibis Messenger using React and TypeScript, getting positive reactions from management.
Migrated messaging services from Twilio to Sendbird, ensuring full adoption by 100% of users in the first month.

experience.title: Senior Front-end Developer
achievements: Collaborated on new features for the SkyQ application (British Sky Broadcasting), using React and Redux, improving load times on old TVs from 20 to 1 second.
Authored and deployed key features for SkyQ on PlayStation 4, expanding product reach via successful store releases.

experience.title: Front-end Developer
achievements: Developed on startups in Brazil, such as Kanoah, DataRisk, and Resultados Digitais, as a Front-end Developer.
Championed important features for Kanoah Test, a JIRA plugin for testing management, today part of Adaptavist, securing the first international client.
Conveined the first version of the WYSIWYG landing page editor for RD Station, at Resultados Digitais.
Conceived from ground up the first draft of the machine learning platform for DataRisk.

education.degree: Diploma in Software Engineering and Development
